title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Planning and Development Act 2000 

(Section 181(2)(a))(No.2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited planning development act 2000 (section 181(2)(a))(no.2) order 2024

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than
text_raw:
2. The Planning and Development Act 2000 (No. 30 of 2000) (other than 
sections 50, 50A, 50B and 181 of that Act) shall not apply to the development 
described in Part 1 of the Schedule proposed to be carried out by me or on my 
behalf.
text_norm: 2 planning development act 2000 (no 30 2000) (other section 50 50a 50b 181 act) shall apply development described part 1 schedule proposed carried behalf

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth
text_raw:
3. This Order shall cease to have effect on the date that is the fifth 

anniversary of the date on which this Order comes into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [399]
text_norm: 3 order shall cease effect date fifth anniversary date order come operation 4 399

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 1. Development to provide for the accommodation of in or around 1000
text_raw:
1. Development to provide for the accommodation of in or around 1000 
applicants within the meaning of the European Communities (Receptions 
Conditions) Regulations 2018 (S.I. 230 of 2018) with tents and modular 
units .
text_norm: 1 development provide accommodation around 1000 applicant within meaning european community (receptions conditions) regulation 2018 (s.i 230 2018) tent modular unit

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 2. The development works will result in suitable groundworks for 100
text_raw:
2. The development works will result in suitable groundworks for 100 

Unicef High Performance Tents.
text_norm: 2 development work result suitable groundwork 100 unicef high performance tent

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 3. The external dimensions of the tents will be 42sqm.
text_raw: 3. The external dimensions of the tents will be 42sqm.

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 4. The provision of sanitary and shower facilities.
text_raw: 4. The provision of sanitary and shower facilities.

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 5. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains
text_raw:
5. All proposed sanitary modules to be connected to the existing mains 

sewage system on site.
text_norm: 5 proposed sanitary module connected existing main sewage system site

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 6. Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities.
text_raw: 6. Provision and storage of hot and cold water for sanitary facilities.
text_norm: 6 provision storage hot cold water sanitary facility

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 7. The external general/amenity areas are to be provided with security
text_raw:
7. The external general/amenity areas are to be provided with security 
fencing, adequate external lighting and also protected by a certified 
external CCTV surveillance system.
text_norm: 7 external general amenity area provided security fencing adequate external lighting also protected certified external cctv surveillance system

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 8. The provision of suitable and adequate pest and vermin proof refuse
text_raw:
8. The provision of suitable and adequate pest and vermin proof refuse 

storage facilities.
text_norm: 8 provision suitable adequate pest vermin proof refuse storage facility

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 9. The installations for the supply of gas (LPG), oil and electricity including
text_raw:
9. The installations for the supply of gas (LPG), oil and electricity including 
pipework, storage facilities and electrical distribution boxes and any 
necessary ancillary works required in relation to same.
text_norm: 9 installation supply gas (lpg) oil electricity including pipework storage facility electrical distribution box necessary ancillary work required relation same

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 10. The site perimeter to be secured with 2.4m high security fencing and the
text_raw:
10. The site perimeter to be secured with 2.4m high security fencing and the 
external general/amenity areas to be provided with adequate external 
lighting and also protected by a certified external CCTV surveillance 
system.
text_norm: 10 site perimeter secured 2.4m high security fencing external general amenity area provided adequate external lighting also protected certified external cctv surveillance system

title: PLANNING AND DEVELOPMENT ACT 2000 (SECTION 181(2)(A))
heading: 11. Such further and other ancillary works, to include site development
text_raw:
11. Such further and other ancillary works, to include site development 

works and landscaping, to facilitate the above works as may be required. 

The detail of the site boundary is as set out in the map in Part 2 of this schedule. 

 
 
 
 
 [399] 5 

Part 2

Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth,

RODERIC O'GORMAN,

Youth.
